item.title: Visual Layouts Filtrify & Isotope Visual Layouts - will they work with your WordPress Theme?
item.description: Hi Damien, I’m about to start using your amazing plugins and was wondering if you could offer me some advice. Is it possible for me to use your filtering capability with this WordPress theme … To be honest … I think I’m better off with just the plugins. Thanks I recently received this email and thought I’d write up a few notes on my plugins. Right or Wrong … If you like the style of your theme, WordPress plugins are there to extend the function of your site.
